data.lyric:
[ti:OKRA (Explicit)]
[ar:Tyler, The Creator]
[al:OKRA]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]OKRA - Tyler, The Creator
[00:00.18]Written by：Tyler/The Creator
[00:00.36]And let it go ayo
[00:03.62]I cut off some friends where they go
[00:05.78]Did this sh*t in one take ayo
[00:07.41]I stick to the plan that's the goal ayy we got that fire sh*t n**ga
[00:10.77]F**k these n**gas man run it
[00:12.42]
[00:14.20]Check my bankroll ayo 400K for vehicle
[00:17.08]Paintjob look like ashy ankles on Django interior look mango
[00:20.87]Shotgun grape he look like mayo
[00:22.67]Golden voice on payroll neck all gold like Kayo Corp
[00:25.45]We aim at dorks get out the way yo
[00:27.99]Keep them bucks in banks like Yayo
[00:29.44]Swampy n**gas out the bayou pockets flooded y'all be dilute
[00:32.99]Watered down I'm Big Mac
[00:34.62]I'm quarter pound you chicken nugget
[00:36.32]
[00:37.28]F**k it travel bag Balenciaga 30000 just for luggage
[00:41.49]Financial advisor buggin' Flower Boy is buzzin'
[00:44.45]Grammy-nominated tell yo cousin ain't nobody f**kin' with him
[00:48.44]Man now they go
[00:51.00]I cut off some friends where they go
[00:54.18]I stick to the plan that's the goal
[00:57.65]F**k these n**gas man that's for sure say
[01:00.90]
[01:01.52]Uno the shoe red with the blue
[01:03.20]Look like a flag what the f**k it do
[01:04.96]Golf be the set no more OF
[01:06.52]Like Ron Artest b**ch we aim for your neck
[01:08.10]Give a f**k about you or your respect yeah that way
[01:10.73]F**k your accolades but I made the cut like I pack a blade
[01:13.19]You could call me brush I've been makin' waves
[01:14.88]Since Ashley Banks' cousin had a fade but that's '92 I'm '91
[01:18.60]Watts Riot in my blood n**ga what's up
[01:20.08]And that p**sy pink like the drink in my cup
[01:21.93]Lemonade yeah it's Minute Maid I been gettin' paid
[01:24.33]Pockets gainin' weight
[01:25.25]Your bank statements on Mary Kate but that's up to you
[01:29.42]Man now they go
[01:31.27]I ain't f**kin' with none of these n**gas man
[01:32.40]I cut off some friends where they go
[01:34.77]Yeah give these n**gas information n**ga
[01:35.50]I stick to the plan that's the goal
[01:37.98]Now we never f**kin' stop
[01:38.67]F**k these ayo n**gas man that's for sure ayo
[01:42.37]Tell Tim Chalamet to come get at me
[01:44.23]Skin glowin' clear of acne
[01:45.98]Diamonds see-through so holographic
[01:47.57]Red Ones look like Aidan Mackey spent dinero like Taxi Driver
[01:51.26]Handmade is that thing with tires but I rode the bike
[01:53.52]And Vill tail behind me
[01:54.54]And he got the Cannon like he bagged Mariah
[01:56.18]Yeah we straight but if you wrinkle up the situation
[01:58.28]He will go grab the iron and he do what I says like Simon no violence
[02:01.35]And my b**ch mixed like jambalaya
[02:02.41]
[02:02.96]Man f**k with the fam we in Japan
[02:04.77]B**ch you're a bum see you don't understand
[02:06.24]Yeah I cut off some friends T where you been
[02:08.15]B**ch I'm in Bel-Air been lookin' for land
[02:09.54]Need a spot in the hills not the beach need a pool
[02:11.24]Just to cool it I do need the grass not the sand
[02:13.15]Got enough rocks see check my hand
[02:14.98]And I got crack watch how I talk
[02:16.61]And it's still Wolf Gang b**ch watch how I bark
[02:18.41]Wallace still trippin' on sh*t that I bought
[02:20.20]But I really do not care the cost 'cause okra
[02:25.19]Man now they go
[02:26.78]I cut off some friends
data.trans:
[ti:OKRA (Explicit)]
[ar:Tyler, The Creator]
[al:OKRA]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.18]//
[00:00.36]现在开始
[00:03.62]我与一些朋友断绝了关系 现在他们销声匿迹
[00:05.78]这种情况还会发生吗
[00:07.41]我坚持我的计划 这是我的目标 我们心中充满激情
[00:10.77]瞧不起这些虚伪的人 掌控全场吧
[00:12.42]
[00:14.20]清点我的资产 在豪车上砸下重金
[00:17.08]他是如此天赋异禀 他拥有坚强的核心
[00:20.87]身负重器 他是如此所向披靡
[00:22.67]我拥有金子般的嗓音 钱多得根本花不完
[00:25.45]所有的蠢货赶紧走开 别挡着我的路
[00:27.99]账户上的钱与日俱增
[00:29.44]那些停滞不前的人们总会一事无成 而我们的灵感取之不竭
[00:32.99]我就像麦当劳一样长盛不衰
[00:34.62]你们都是我刀下之肉
[00:36.32]
[00:37.28]我买下巴黎世家的包 只为当个行李箱用用
[00:41.49]财务顾问只会趋利避害
[00:44.45]我明确告诉你 我会保护你的家人 没人能够欺负他们
[00:48.44]兄弟 现在他们已经离开了
[00:51.00]我与一些朋友断绝了关系 现在他们销声匿迹
[00:54.18]我坚持我的计划 这是我的目标 我们心中充满激情
[00:57.65]我根本看不起这些人 我很确定
[01:00.90]
[01:01.52]我穿着奢侈品鞋
[01:03.20]我就是行业的标杆 但这种虚名我根本不屑一顾
[01:04.96]我们永远团结一致 不会被那些绯闻困扰
[01:06.52]就像Ron Artest那种人 我们一定会让你血债血偿
[01:08.10]你向我们挑衅 已经将我激怒
[01:10.73]收起你那虚伪的赞美吧 我会让你一刀毙命
[01:13.19]我所到之处 片甲不留 我会掀起惊涛骇浪
[01:14.88]自从Ashley Banks隐退之后 乐坛就再无巨星 这种情况由我来改变
[01:18.60]我的血液中流动着经典节奏 就是这样
[01:20.08]身边美女如云 就像我的美酒 取之不尽
[01:21.93]我要喝橙子味的汽水 我会付给你钱
[01:24.33]财富不断累积
[01:25.25]你在女人身上挥金如土 那是你的决定
[01:29.42]兄弟 现在他们已经离开了
[01:31.27]我不屑于与这些乌合之众为伍
[01:32.40]我与一些朋友断绝了关系 现在他们销声匿迹
[01:34.77]给这些人一点颜色瞧瞧吧
[01:35.50]我坚持我的计划 这是我的目标
[01:37.98]我们永不止步
[01:38.67]对这些人不屑一顾 这毋庸置疑
[01:42.37]告诉Tim Chalamet 尽管放马过来吧
[01:44.23]我浑身污秽
[01:45.98]但我手上戴满钻石
[01:47.57]我手上戴着价值连城的红宝石和黄钻戒指
[01:51.26]我的豪车全都是手工打造 而我根本就不在意
[01:53.52]狗仔与我如影随形
[01:54.54]他用相机记录着我的生活 丝毫也不松懈
[01:56.18]我们都很直接 如果你敢挑战我的地位
[01:58.28]他就会荡平一切 他完全听从我的号令 对我俯首帖耳
[02:01.35]身边美女如云 就像享用不尽的饕餮盛宴一样
[02:02.41]
[02:02.96]嗨翻全场吧 我们在日本为所欲为
[02:04.77]你是如此疯狂 看来你还不了解现状
[02:06.24]我斩断了一些感情 你曾去过哪里
[02:08.15]我曾在贝爱尔市游荡 想要找到自己的位置
[02:09.54]想要一座山顶豪宅 而非海边别墅
[02:11.24]只想找个地方凉快凉快 我需要草地而非沙滩
[02:13.15]身边群山环绕 钱多得数不清
[02:14.98]我总是最优秀的 认真倾听我的教诲
[02:16.61]我仍拥有最好的团队 看我尽情闪耀
[02:18.41]那些小人仍在喋喋不休 看我如何将他们击倒
[02:20.20]我根本不在乎付出什么代价
[02:25.19]兄弟 现在他们已经离开了
[02:26.78]我跟一些朋友绝交了
